The Quranic researcher said that he did not seek a sperm from a semen who wish, etc.By starting creation.Al -Hasan read "Pain of Tik" in the winter of the speech on the way of tafs, and read the most of the "I am" with the sublime metaphor, so the guarantee is for the sperm, that is, the man is based on the man and the man in the man The Quds of Yaa, which is the reader of Hafs and my father (P-150) Omar, with a difference from it, Jacob, Salmam, Al-Jahdari and Ibn Muhsin for the German.
